live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56184.summary: Some customers in Portage la Prairie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56184.title: Dec 16 - Portage la Prairie | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
